name: Rainbow Chicken
description: This Rainbow Chicken recipe is a vibrant, high-protein, and low-carb delight. Perfect for those on a health-conscious journey, it mixes the crunch and freshness of various colored veggies with juicy chicken, seasoned to perfection. Ideal for anyone looking to enjoy a flavorful dish that's both nutritious and satisfying.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your vegetables: Wash and dice 60 g of red, 60 g of yellow vegetables, and 30 g of green capsicum. Thinly slice 15 g of red onion. Mince 10 g of garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut 250 g of chicken (drained if in brine) into bite-sized pieces. Season with 0.25 tsp of ground pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sliced onion, cooking until they start to soften and become fragrant, about 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Increase the heat to medium-high and add the chicken pieces to the pan. Cook until the chicken is browned and nearly cooked through, about 7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced vegetables to the pan with the chicken. Stir everything together and continue to cook until the vegetables are tender but still crisp, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the Rainbow Chicken hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
